name: qualweb_server
description: QualWeb is an automatic accessibility evaluator for webpages.

--ign-warn.description: Doesn't display warning messages on console

--@@.description: Deactivates all modules that are dependable

--run.description: Checks modules dependencies ant sets them to run

--force.description: Force the modules to continue executing in case of error

--show.description: Shows the output of the given modules after each evaluation is complete

-filelinks.description: Receives a file of urls to evaluate

-filedom.description: Receives a file with dom code to evaluate

-db-in.description: Input urls are given by a database script

-db-out.description: Output evaluation is stored in a database

--web.description: Converts output to be interpreted by the website
